B

Blogger - Class in models
 
Blogger() - Constructor for class models.Blogger
 
Blogger(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class models.Blogger
 
blogger - Variable in class models.ImgPath
 
BloggerController - Class in controllers
BloggerController class; Contains our methods through which we control all action concerning the Bitpik blog;
BloggerController() - Constructor for class controllers.BloggerController
 
bloggerPicture(int) - Static method in class controllers.BloggerController
 
blogImagePath - Variable in class models.Blogger
 
bought_products - Variable in class models.User
 
BPCredit - Class in models
BPCredit is a OneToOne relation to the User; Meaning every User has his own BPCredit which contains the number of credit he has bought;
BPCredit() - Constructor for class models.BPCredit
Default contructor
BPCredit(User) - Constructor for class models.BPCredit
Constructor with one parameter; Autmatic 0 to his credit;
BPCredit(int, User) - Constructor for class models.BPCredit
Constructor with two parameters;
bpcredit - Variable in class models.User
 
buyCreditSuccess(String) - Static method in class controllers.CreditController
After the paypal process of buying the bitpik credits; We set the value of the bitpik credits to the user adding them to the bitpik credits he has already had;
buyer_comment - Variable in class models.TransactionP
 
buyer_stringValue - Variable in class models.TransactionP
 
buyer_value - Variable in class models.TransactionP
 
buyerUser - Variable in class models.Product
 
buyProductSuccess(int, String) - Static method in class controllers.ProductController
When a product is bought, the items attribute boolean isSold is set to true; and the buyerUser is set to the user who is currently logged in, that is, set to the user who has clicked (later gone through the procedure of the PayPal process);
